1.title: Ikinci Sans
1.plot: Did Omer choose his love or his pride and his principles? The time has come for the answer.

2.title: Herseye Ragmen
2.plot: Neriman is extremely sorry for what she did. She must speak with Omer. She apologizes to her nephew. Does Neriman have any credit left with Omer? Does the scabs surrounding Omer break and does he forgive Neriman? While everyone who runs into Omer is stunned, Defne does not know what to do with the invitation to an event she receives from Pamir. Koray who has left the company and opened up a boutique starts to beg Omer to be able to return to Passionis. What is Koray going to do in order to return to the company? What about Pamir? What does he have to say about working...

3.title: Söz veriyorum
3.plot: After their last encounter, Defne said everything that was left to Omer. Now it's time for Omer. The next step for Omer is surprising and quite ambitious! The tension between Omer and Pamir is rising steadily. Defne is building walls around her and Omer does not intend to stay behind these walls and stay friends. Having been trapped in the corner, Defne must now determine the roles. On the other hand, Omer who is trying to put things back on track for the company, is getting help from Necmi. There is also a hurry to renovate the company. Can a compromise be made for ...

4.title: Eskisi Gibi
4.plot: Finally Defne and Omer are alone. Defne came and saw that nothing is the same. There are no secrets left. Defne blames herself for everything that has changed, that has and is going wrong. This time everything is in Defne's hands.

5.title: Yanimda kal
5.plot: Omer kisses Defne at a totally unexpected moment. What will be Defne's reaction to this intimacy?

6.title: Artik Benimsin
6.plot: Is everything finished? Or will Omer as usual be able to overcome everything that has happened to him?

7.title: Ikimizin Arasinda
7.plot: Defne has showed her cards. Now in the right place she has jumped off the edge. Defne and Omer are floating in the clouds. Defne has told Omer what she wants, there are no obstacles left between them.

8.title: Ask Dedigin
8.plot: All bets are off, all cards have been laid out. After Omer learns that Pamir is a rental love, will he tell Defne about it?

9.title: Seninleyken
9.plot: The struggle between Omer and Pamir finally comes to an end. Will Defne learn the truth? What is going to be the result of the conversation between Omer and Hulusi? Hulusi finally breaks the pencil and Neriman finally pays the price for her actions. Things are going to become very complicated. Omer and Defne meet at the place where Defne received the offer and they talk about everything one by one. Since the first days, what happened, how it happened, what they have lived, everything is reviled. Using the excuse of the convention, everyone hits the road. At the ...

10.title: Tutuldum Sana
10.plot: Pamir goes to Turkan to tell her everything that he knows. Defne is on Omer's doorstep. What will happen now? Meanwhile Sinan must convince Omer on a certain situation. Omer, who can convince him? Only one name comes to mind - Defne. But will Defne be able to convince Omer? Lara becomes ill. Seda's world falls apart. Seda, who thinks that she is not spending enough time with her daughter, makes a rash decision to break with Sinan, and Sinan doesn't know what to do. Omer and Defne makes a decision to have a house party. They go together to the market to shop and gets ...

11.title: Bulutlarin Üstünde
11.plot: Omer has a big secret. He does not want to tell anyone. As Omer continues to eat himself about this, how is he going to hide this secret from everyone? Defne, who realizes that the man she loves has a problem, tries to figure out what this secret is. As for Omer, all he wants is to make Defn happy. Omer is after each and every one of Defne's dreams. Pamir is not in good shape. As time passes he is falling apart. Cevdet is missing. This situation makes Iso even more confused than ever. Meanwhile there is a lot of hastiness at the office. This is because baby Iso is ...

12.title: Pesindeyim
12.plot: Omer and Defne are now warmer to each other. Evrything that they have lived through brings them closer together. As Omer's situation gets worse, Defn is trying to be next to him at every moment, which is causing much difficulty in her life. But in spite of everything love is beautiful. Neriman is now at the office. Immediately she and Koray form an alliance and constantly are throwing out strange ideas and causing mass chaos. Meanwhile Koray has become extremely bonded with baby Iso, he just cannot have enough of him. He goes to see him, bought him new clothes. They ...

13.title: Sadece Sen Varsin
13.plot: Defne does the unimaginable, something tat no one could ever expect. She has nothing left to lose. The only thing in her mind is Omer. The time has come for Omer to meet the crazy Defne that he has never seen before. Standing before him is a very different crazy Defne. Meanwhile Sinan has his own problems. As for Pamir - he has lost his way. Iso is really bad. The pains of love and confusion bring all of the men together. They all go fishing and try to forget what goes on in their lives. From this very interesting gathering a very interesting decision will be made. ...

14.title: Mutlu olmak icin
14.plot: Ömer and Defne decided to go to Rome. So they will open a clean page in their lives. Now they will live in a place where no one knows them, they will start all over again. Before they leave, Ömer and Defne are going to have a typical Defo night. Ömer is going to enter Defne's real World and watch a football game with her and will visit the places that she likes. Neriman and Koray play the pure and innocent in response to Sinan's pale decision. They are both trying to get a hold of him and his decision. The end looks like it will benefit Seda.

15.title: Sonsuza Kadar
15.plot: Everything is now beautiful. Defne and Omer are very happy. They have slowly but surely established a pattern living together and becoming one. Neriman make here move "Come on get married and have children already!". Defne falls for Nerimans advice, and plays every game she can trying to get the idea of marriage into Omer's thoughts. But what she does not now is that Omer is already thinking about marriage. Meanwhile there is excitement somewhere else. House parties, office parties, and Koray's magnificent idea - to dress Omer as Santa Claus. Will Omer accept the idea...

16.title: Mucize Gibi
16.plot: Defne and Omer are now in front of an exciting door. As Defne is trying to figure out whether she is pregnant, Omer's secret finally comes out. Meanwhile they have an indoor football game. Koray's team against Sinan and Omer's team. If Koray wins, the name of the first born boy will be Koray. The referee is Aytekin. At the same time Defne finally makes the first move in reconciling with her family. The shelters for the street dogs that Iso has built end up becoming a reason for many means.

17.title: Bir Masala Gibi
17.plot: Omer goes to speak with Turkan and explain himself to her and to get a permission for happiness. The journey is full of emotions and tears. Defne is going to tell Omer that she is pregnant, but how? Omer's reaction is worth seeing. As the Cinderella story comes to an end, Defne truly becomes a real Cinderella. Defne's prince is of course Omer. Time passes. Their situation during the pregnancy, their children, the love that surrounds them, and the feelings of fulfillment and happiness of Defne and Omer. Love conquers all and Defne and Omer finally live the live they ...

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Just as she thinks that everything is finished, Defne's door rings with a miracle that she cannot say no to, and she accepts the offer of playing a love game. According to the terms of the game, she must make one of the most successful businessman in the country to fall in love wit her. In this game she receives the most help from the man that she is truly in love with. This is truly a scary reality, and turns into a crazy love triangle. Defne is forced to face life's truth: "Do we choose our love or does love choose us?".

2.title: Ask Lazim
2.plot: Defne is attending a catalog shooting for the first time in her life on the most beautiful beach but there are going to be many unanticipated problems that await her.

3.title: Ilk Dans
3.plot: Things get complicated. All preparations are being put together for the big fashion show. This big day in a single moment becomes a day full of emotions.

4.title: Özür dilerim
4.plot: What will Defne's reaction be when she is accused of being a thief?

5.title: Kiskaniyorum
5.plot: Defne have feelings of jealousy regarding Omer. Yasemin messes things up again very badly.

6.title: Dogum günüm
6.plot: This week is Omer's birthday. Omer does not like to celebrate his birthday. This time Defne without Neriman's wants to have a surprise for him. However Omer is a difficult man, what could she do?

7.title: Kiyamam
7.plot: As usual Defne arrives at Omer's house to prepare his breakfast. But what does she see? Omer is very ill. She immediately starts taking care of him. Soup and ice pack to help lower his fever, calming feelings, and looks of love - Omer who has not had this much emotional and soft attention in a very long time, and being close to Defne is something that he must put up with. Omer continues to think that it really was Yasemin who bought him the novel for his birthday, and Yasemin continues to use this opportunity. Yasemin who is now certain that she has won over Omer's ...

8.title: Deli deli
8.plot: Omer does not know what to do.

9.title: Gitme
9.plot: Will Defne be able to forgive Omer?

11.title: Ben Varim
11.plot: Defne and Omer reach a new turning point.

12.title: Eminim
12.plot: Defne and Omer are no longer hiding their love.

13.title: Sonunda
13.plot: Will Omer and Defne be open with each other?

14.title: Saril Bana
14.plot: It is romance time for Omer and Defne.

15.title: Ask Acisi
15.plot: Defne and Omer cannot stand to be apart. Will their love for each other bring them back together?

16.title: Sensiz Olmaz
16.plot: Defne and Omer Face-off. Who is the stranger that returns from his past?

17.title: Kal bu gece
17.plot: The passion between Omer and Defne continues to grow.

18.title: Bana iyi geliyorsun
18.plot: Defne and Omer overcome difficulties together.

19.title: Iyiki Varsin
19.plot: The battle between Iz and Defne begins. Omer and Sinan are at the breaking point.

20.title: Biz olduk bile
20.plot: Time for Love. Omer and Defne's relationship takes a huge step forward. The bombs continue to explode one after another. Will the break-up of Sinan and Omer cause them to become enemies?

21.title: Yandim
21.plot: The love between Omer and Defne has reached its peak. But is everything going to go as hoped? Will Defne in spite of everything accepts Omer's marriage proposal? Will love conquer all?

23.title: Kiralik Ask
23.plot: Is there any hope for Defne and Omer? Defne is at a dead end.

24.title: Yine yeni yeniden
24.plot: Defne goes back to her old lifestyle. Will Defne's love be defeated?

25.title: Ne seninle ne sensiz
25.plot: Let the love games begin. Defne and Omer come face to face.

26.title: Ask ve Gurur
26.plot: Competition heats up. Defne make the decision to meet with Neriman.

27.title: Hediyelerin en guzeli
27.plot: A power struggle begins between the two lovers.

28.title: Oyun gibi
28.plot: A fresh start for Defne and Omer. Omer and Defne who have been defeated by their love now have a new question that awaits them.

29.title: Bitince
29.plot: Defne and Omer are locked into a room together. Hulusi squeezes Neriman into a corner, so Neriman uses her last trump card. What is going to happen at this surprise breakfast?

30.title: Seninleyiz Baris Arduc
30.plot: Defne and Omer marking their youth. A walk down memory lane.

31.title: Pesindeyim
31.plot: Omer Iplikci is after the big secret. A new period begins for the love between Defne and Omer.

32.title: Seninleyken
32.plot: A huge shock for Omer Iplikci.

33.title: Neyi geldin bana
33.plot: Sparks are everywhere as Omer and Defne start living together in the same house. Omer has a difficult decision to make.

34.title: Canin seninle olmak istiyor
34.plot: Where the relationship between Omer and Defne is heading? The love between Omer and Defne is growing.

35.title: Özledim
35.plot: Omer and Defne's love is moving at full speed. With the arrival of Gallo everything goes off balance.

36.title: Oyun bitti
36.plot: Is the love is coming to an end? Defne is very confused.

37.title: Gülüsün yeter
37.plot: Finally the game is over. Defne is finally at the point that she wants. Omer and Defne are now closer than ever before.

38.title: Beraberken
38.plot: Has Tramba learned everything? Defne does not say no when Omer says "We are going to my place". Regardless of what happens they have no obstacles before them preventing them from living their love for each other.

39.title: Rüya gibisin
39.plot: Things start to get hot between Defne and Omer. Inside the butterflies are fluttering, so they start a new game. Yasemin, Sinan, Defne and Omer spend a fantastic day together.

40.title: Alev Aldi Buralar
40.plot: Omer and Defne start working together again. Defne finally fulfills Omer's wish by returning to Passionis, and the fact that they are going to get married is spreading throughout the company.

41.title: Seni Seviyorum
41.plot: Omer and Defne are happier than they have ever been. They are alone together and they don't want this moment to end. This totally unplanned getting together has made them closer than ever before.

42.title: Yalniz Sen
42.plot: After the fashion show a very prestigious party begins. Whatever happens happens at this party and things get very confusing. to make matters worse the press is there.

43.title: Altüst olmayiz biz
43.plot: There is a spring catalog shoot being done outdoors. The fight between Sinan and Omer is continuing to grow. Yasemin and Defne are going to work together to find a happy medium. But the result is going to stun everyone.

44.title: Sadece benimsin
44.plot: When Defne suddenly arrives at Fikret's house, both women pull out their swords. Fikret thinks that she has a chance with Omer, and she does not even hide her thought from Defne.

45.title: Aklim basinda degil
45.plot: Defne's house is put up for sale. Defne is certain that she is going to be able to do whatever is necessary to stop the sale. She does everything that she can do without making the situation obvious to Omer.

46.title: Karma Karisik
46.plot: There is no reason left for the truth to not be exposed. Defne no longer has the strength to continue hiding everything. After the letter arrives for Omer, she starts to wait. Waiting for Omer to read the letter and learn everything.

47.title: Anlat Bana
47.plot: Did Omer read the letter? Defne left the letter for him to read and turned around and went home. Whatever is going to happen will happen. What is going to be Omer's reaction?

48.title: Sensiz Yasayamam
48.plot: Defne's feet are not touching the ground. Love again, love always. What is the surprise that Ömer flies to Defne? Things got mixed up on the Hulusi front. Neriman is in panic. What does Hulusi want from Neriman? Everyone will play all the balances in the place where they are together. Whose is the secret that falls like a bomb at the wedding? Even Koray is worried. Defne and Ömer's love is moving to a different dimension with these developments. To which offer of Neriman does Defne says yes?

49.title: Bir yol bulunur
49.plot: The summer of love has arrived for Defne and Omer. Two full days of love. Defne runs away from home to be with Omer. This romantic weekend is full of surprises. Sinan makes huge decisions regarding Koray.

50.title: Sakladigin Sir
50.plot: Omer is face to face with his grandfather. Now what is going to happen? In spite of everything will the engagement occur? What is Omer's hesitance?

51.title: Seni alip gitsem
51.plot: Separation is knocking on the door. The lovers are all in broken pieces. Now what will happen.

52.title: Dügün
52.plot: Defne and Ömer reconciled. Love is flaring up again. As the wedding preparations go on, the unexpected appeal overturns all the balances. Who is standing against the Omer and Defne's marriage? Lovers are stubborn. So, will love be proud? Will the disputes be resolved? On the other hand, Yasemin and Sinan are counting the days for marriage. Who's gonna be the best guy? And finally the wedding day. Breathing was held. Huge surprises and unexpected developments at the door.

imdb.plot outline: Defne, a poor girl living with her grand mother, brother and sister is tangled in a deal to make the famous business man, Omer fall in love with her and marry her before it's too late. Defne is forced to do this due to life obstacles and with her differences, will she be able to make Omer fall in love with her?
imdb.title: Kiralik Ask
plot: When Defne's brother gets into debt and is held captive, Defne is forced to accept an offer in exchange for the money. She has to make omer, a wealthy shoe designer who owns a company, fall in love with her and marry her.

Defne, a poor girl living with her grand mother, brother and sister is tangled in a deal to make the famous business man, Omer fall in love with her and marry her before it's too late. Defne is forced to do this due to life obstacles and with her differences, will she be able to make Omer fall in love with her?::ahmetkozan
